name: ITX.219.03.E Statement of Tax Withheld
query:
SELECT	
    ss.employee_name AS "Employee:Data:220",
    SUM(IF(sdb.salary_component = 'Basic', sdb.amount, 0)) AS "BASIC SALARY:Currency:150",
    SUM(ss.gross_pay) - SUM(IF(sdb.salary_component = 'Basic', sdb.amount, 0)) AS "OTHER ALLOWANCES:Currency:180",
    SUM(ss.gross_pay) "GROSS PAYMENT:Currency:150",
    SUM(IF(sdd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sdd.amount, 0)) AS "EXEMPTION:Currency:150",
    SUM(ss.gross_pay) - SUM(IF(sdd.salary_component = 'NSSF', sdd.amount, 0)) AS "TAXBALE AMOUNT:Currency:150",
    SUM(IF(sdp.salary_component = 'PAYE', sdp.amount, 0)) AS "PAYE:Currency:150"
FROM `tabSalary Slip` ss LEFT JOIN `tabEmployee` e ON ss.employee = e.name
                         LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sdb ON ss.name = sdb.parent AND sdb.salary_component = 'Basic'
                         LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sdd ON ss.name = sdd.parent AND sdd.salary_component = 'NSSF'
                         LEFT JOIN `tabSalary Detail` sdp ON ss.name = sdp.parent AND sdp.salary_component = 'PAYE'
WHERE	ss.start_date >= %(from_date)s
AND	    ss.end_date <= %(to_date)s
AND     ss.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY ss.employee
